message.body: is there any way you (or someone you trust) could come help me take your piece out of the kiln?
Hey! sry i just got home from the doctors w my friend. cld we take it out tomorrow?
yeah, i guess we'll just have to do it tomorrow. is there a time in the morning that's okay?
Ya, thatd be cool. when were u thinking? i could also just have giovanni help me take it out so u dnt need to come in?
could you have it out by 1, possibly? i have to reload but i have afternoon plans.
Oh ya! def :] ill go in around noon
Hey, im still walking, but ill be there soon....and ill have it out by 1, sorry im running late!
no problem! i'm just chilling out.
